trans-unit.source: Azure customers can unlock 25,000 free emails each month.
trans-unit.target: Azure customers can unlock 25,000 free emails each month.

trans-unit.source: These 25,000 free monthly emails will give you access to advanced reporting and analytics and <link><linkText>all APIs[]</linkText><title></title></link> (Web, SMTP, Event, Parse and more).
trans-unit.target: These 25,000 free monthly emails will give you access to advanced reporting and analytics and <link><linkText>all APIs[]</linkText><title></title></link> (Web, SMTP, Event, Parse and more).

trans-unit.source: For information about additional services provided by SendGrid, see the <link><linkText>SendGrid Features[]</linkText><title></title></link> page.
trans-unit.target: For information about additional services provided by SendGrid, see the <link><linkText>SendGrid Features[]</linkText><title></title></link> page.

trans-unit.source: To sign up for a SendGrid account
trans-unit.target: To sign up for a SendGrid account

trans-unit.source: Log in to the <link><linkText>Azure Management Portal[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Log in to the <link><linkText>Azure Management Portal[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In the lower pane of the management portal, click New.
trans-unit.target: In the lower pane of the management portal, click New.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>command-bar-new</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>command-bar-new</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Marketplace.
trans-unit.target: Click Marketplace.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>sendgrid-store</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>sendgrid-store</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Choose an Application and Service dialog, select SendGrid and click the right arrow.
trans-unit.target: In the Choose an Application and Service dialog, select SendGrid and click the right arrow.

trans-unit.source: In the Personalize Application and Service dialog select the SendGrid plan you want to sign up for.
trans-unit.target: In the Personalize Application and Service dialog select the SendGrid plan you want to sign up for.

trans-unit.source: Enter a name to identify your SendGrid service in your Azure settings, or use the default value of SendGridEmailDelivery.Simplified.SMTPWebAPI.
trans-unit.target: Enter a name to identify your SendGrid service in your Azure settings, or use the default value of SendGridEmailDelivery.Simplified.SMTPWebAPI.

trans-unit.source: Names must be between 1 and 100 characters in length and contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, dots, and underscores.
trans-unit.target: Names must be between 1 and 100 characters in length and contain only alphanumeric characters, dashes, dots, and underscores.

trans-unit.source: The name must be unique in your list of subscribed Azure Store Items.
trans-unit.target: The name must be unique in your list of subscribed Azure Store Items.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>store-screen-2</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>store-screen-2</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Choose a value for the region; for example, West US.
trans-unit.target: Choose a value for the region; for example, West US.

trans-unit.source: Click the right arrow.
trans-unit.target: Click the right arrow.

trans-unit.source: On the Review Purchase tab, review the plan and pricing information, and review the legal terms.
trans-unit.target: On the Review Purchase tab, review the plan and pricing information, and review the legal terms.

trans-unit.source: If you agree to the terms, click the check mark.
trans-unit.target: If you agree to the terms, click the check mark.

trans-unit.source: After you click the check mark, your SendGrid account will begin the [SendGrid provisioning process].
trans-unit.target: After you click the check mark, your SendGrid account will begin the [SendGrid provisioning process].

trans-unit.source: <linkText>store-screen-3</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>store-screen-3</linkText>

trans-unit.source: After confirming your purchase you are redirected to the add-ons dashboard and you will see the message Purchasing SendGrid.
trans-unit.target: After confirming your purchase you are redirected to the add-ons dashboard and you will see the message Purchasing SendGrid.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>sendgrid-purchasing-message</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>sendgrid-purchasing-message</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Your SendGrid account is provisioned immediately and you will see the message Successfully purchased Add-On SendGrid.
trans-unit.target: Your SendGrid account is provisioned immediately and you will see the message Successfully purchased Add-On SendGrid.

trans-unit.source: Your account and credentials are now created.
trans-unit.target: Your account and credentials are now created.

trans-unit.source: You are ready to send emails at this point.
trans-unit.target: You are ready to send emails at this point.

trans-unit.source: To modify your subscription plan or see the SendGrid contact settings, click the name of your SendGrid service to open the SendGrid Marketplace dashboard.
trans-unit.target: To modify your subscription plan or see the SendGrid contact settings, click the name of your SendGrid service to open the SendGrid Marketplace dashboard.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>sendgrid-add-on-dashboard</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>sendgrid-add-on-dashboard</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To send an email using SendGrid, you must supply your account credentials (username and password).
trans-unit.target: To send an email using SendGrid, you must supply your account credentials (username and password).

trans-unit.source: To find your SendGrid credentials
trans-unit.target: To find your SendGrid credentials

trans-unit.source: Click Connection Info.
trans-unit.target: Click Connection Info.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>sendgrid-connection-info-button</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>sendgrid-connection-info-button</linkText>

trans-unit.source: In the Connection info dialog, copy the Password and Username to use later in this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: In the Connection info dialog, copy the Password and Username to use later in this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>sendgrid-connection-info</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>sendgrid-connection-info</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To set your email deliverability settings, click the Manage button.
trans-unit.target: To set your email deliverability settings, click the Manage button.

trans-unit.source: This will open the Sendgrid.com web interface where you can login and open your SendGrid Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: This will open the Sendgrid.com web interface where you can login and open your SendGrid Control Panel.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>sendgrid-control-panel</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>sendgrid-control-panel</linkText>

trans-unit.source: For more information on getting started with SendGrid, see <link><linkText>SendGrid Getting Started[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on getting started with SendGrid, see <link><linkText>SendGrid Getting Started[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
